app-desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation.
app-login-url-tooltip: If running for development, probably http://127.0.0.1:8200.
app-depositor-home-title: You are using this app as a depositor
app-depositor-home-info: As a depositor, you can use this app to encrypt sensitive datasets, and grant other users access to the key of sensitive datasets.
app-requester-home-title: You are using this app as a requester
app-requester-home-info: As a requester, you can use this app to decrypt sensitive dataset packages downloaded from FRDR.
app-depositor-encrypt-input-tooltip: The directory containing the dataset you want to encrypt
app-depositor-encrypt-input-missing: Please select the dataset directory that you want to encrpyt.
app-depositor-encrypt-output-tooltip: The directory you want to put the encrypted package
app-depositor-encrypt-output-missing: Please select the output directory you want to put the encrypted package.
app-depositor-encrypt-done: Dataset has been encrypted and transfer package has been created on $1
app-depositor-grant-access-dataset-toolt: The ID of the dataset you're granting access to
app-depositor-grant-access-dataset-missi: Pleaes input the ID of the dataset you're granting access to
app-depositor-grant-access-requester-too: The user ID of the requester you're granting access to
app-depositor-grant-access-requester-mis: Please input the user ID of the requester you're granting access to
app-depositor-grant-access-expire-toolti: The date that this access is going to expire
app-depositor-grant-access-confirm:
You are trying to grant requester $1 access to dataset $2. 

Do you want to continue?
app-depositor-grant-access-login-api: You need to log into FRDR for access granting.
app-depositor-grant-access-find-user-err:
Error finding the user in Vault. 
$1.
app-requester-request-access-confirm-msg: Please copy the following id to the Requester ID Field on the Access Request Page on FRDR.
app-requester-decrypt-url-tooltip: The Vault URL from the email you received granting access
app-requester-decrypt-url-missing: Please input the Vault URL from the email you received granting access
app-requester-decrypt-input-tooltip: The path to the encrypted dataset you've downloaded
app-requester-decrypt-input-missing: Please select the path to the encrypted dataset you've downloaded.
app-requester-decrypt-output-tooltip: The directory you want to put the decrypted package
app-requester-decrypt-output-missing: Please select the directory you want to put the decrypted package.
app-requester-decrypt-confirm:
You are trying to decrypt the dataset $1. 

You should only do this if you're on a trusted computer, as the risk of this data being accessed by another party may be very high.

Do you want to continue?
app-requester-decrypt-done: Dataset has been decrypted for access.
app-profile-copy-error-2: Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C or Command+C, Enter
app-get-entity-id-error:
Error getting user entity id on Vault. 
$1.
app-get-entity-name-error:
Error getting user email on Vault. 
$1.
